server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterpreter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LobbyServer, RoomServer

    public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerInterpreter
    Server interface, provides basic server methods: init(), restart(), dispose() and command interpretation. Subclasses must override xxSubclass() methods since they are called by init(),restart() or dispose() methods restart() calls dispose() then init() so leaving restartSubclass() body empty will still give intended results.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(java.lang.String out_prefix, java.lang.String err_prefix)
      Default Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Closes all connection on server and saves settings.
      protected abstract void disposeSubclass()
      Method called by dispose() after the config file is saved.
      void init()
      Starts server.
      protected abstract void initSubclass()
      Method called when init() method is called.
      abstract boolean isWorking()
      Returns whether the server works currently or not.
      void printErr(java.lang.String s)
      Prints Error message in console with date
      void printInput(java.lang.String s)
      Prints given string as input value
      void printSys(java.lang.String s)
      Prints System message in console with date
      void restart()
      Tries to restart sever.
      protected abstract void restartSubclass()
      Method called by restart() method after dispose() method is called and before init().

                   throws java.lang.Exception

      • dispose

        public final void dispose()
                   throws java.lang.Exception

        java.lang.Exception - if there was any problem while performing this task
